mainDepartureCity.title: Main Departure City
mainDepartureCity.description: Primary departure city/airport code (e.g., TPE for Taipei)

targetCity.title: Target City
targetCity.description: Final destination city/airport code (e.g., NRT for Tokyo)

alternativeDepartureCities.title: Alternative Departure Cities
alternativeDepartureCities.description: Intermediate cities to check for cheaper multi-leg routes (e.g., HKG, ICN)

timePeriods.title: Travel Time Periods
timePeriods.description: Date ranges for departure and return. For specific dates, set start and end to the same date.

airlines.title: Airline Filter (Optional)
airlines.description: Filter results to only these airlines. All flight legs must use these airlines. Leave empty for no filter.

targetLowestPrice.title: Sort by Lowest Price
targetLowestPrice.description: Sort all results by price (lowest first)

transferTimeHours.title: Minimum Transfer Time (hours)
transferTimeHours.description: Minimum hours required between connecting flights

adcBufferDays.title: ADC Buffer Days
adcBufferDays.description: Days buffer for alternative city connections (Â±N days from main departure/return)

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max Requests per Crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of search requests. Large date ranges with multiple ADCs can generate many requests.
